segments.text: Excuse me , could you spare me a few minutes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , certainly.How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know if train 10 is on time to be here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I don ’ t know . I ’ m a passengers ’ m waiting for my train ..
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mind if I read your newspaper for a while ?
segments.speaker: S1
